name: New Wheels, John?
overview: Clutch slipping? Sump full of slime? Big End gone? Well, here is a golden opportunity to run your own second-hand car business, with this rust-free superb little runner of a strategy simulation. NEW WHEELS, JOHN? How much can you squeeze out of the bank manager? Are you looking for a seedy back-street car-lot or a touch of class? Can you spot a bargain at the auction or have you got the nerve to clock a banger? Watch out for the Old Bill, the man from the council, the smart-alec punter and the time-waster. Try to survive in business long enough to pay off you bank loan; you might even earn a quid or two. NEW WHEELS, JOHN?
